entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50
